title: AuthorizerConfiguration
description: This schema defines the Authorization Configuration.

adminPrincipals.title: Admin Principals
adminPrincipals.description: [DEPRECATED: Use 'adminEmails' instead] List of unique admin principals.

adminEmails.title: Admin Emails
adminEmails.description: List of email addresses that should be granted admin privileges. Preferred over adminPrincipals.

allowedEmailDomains.title: Allowed Email Domains
allowedEmailDomains.description: List of email domains allowed to authenticate. If empty, all domains are allowed.

botDomain.title: Bot Domain
botDomain.description: Email domain used for system-created bots (e.g., ingestion-bot@{botDomain}).

testPrincipals.title: Test Principals
testPrincipals.description: List of unique principals used as test users. **NOTE THIS IS ONLY FOR TEST SETUP AND NOT TO BE USED IN PRODUCTION SETUP**

allowedEmailRegistrationDomains.title: Allowed Email Registration Domains
allowedEmailRegistrationDomains.description: List of unique email domains that are allowed to signup on the platforms

principalDomain.title: Principal Domain
principalDomain.description: [DEPRECATED: Use 'botDomain' for bots, 'allowedEmailDomains' for domain restrictions] Domain to use for constructing email addresses.
